name: v2.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Require Ruby 2.5 and standardize some of the testing by @tas50 in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/88
* Update chefstyle requirement from =1.5.9 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/91
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.6.1 to 1.6.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/92
* Update google-api-client requirement from >= 0.23.9, <= 0.52.0 to >= 0.23.9, <= 0.54.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/89
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.6.2 to 1.7.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/93
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.7.1 to 1.7.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/94
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.7.2 to 1.7.4 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/95
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.7.4 to 1.7.5 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/96
* Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/97
* Update chefstyle requirement from 1.7.5 to 2.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/99
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.0.4 to 2.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/100
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.0.5 to 2.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/103
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.0.8 to 2.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/106
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.1.0 to 2.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/109
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.1.3 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/110
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/111
* Use chefstyle linting by @sanjain-progress in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/112
* add support for ruby 3.1 and EOL for 2.5 by @kasif-adnan in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/114
* Update chefstyle requirement from 2.2.1 to 2.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/113
* reuse existing workflow by @kasif-adnan in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/115
* Release 2.3.0 by @ashiqueps in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/116

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/99
* @sanjain-progress made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/112
* @kasif-adnan made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/114
* @ashiqueps made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/pull/116

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-google/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0
